column2: # Recursive function to build the decision tree and prune it. Store the leaf nodes in a list and return it.
Build_tree_prune <- function(data, IV, DV, depth, min_obs) {
recursive_build <- function(data, IV, DV, depth, min_obs, path = list()) {
# 检查当前节点是否应该是一个叶子节点
# 将均值设置为0或1，如果DV列完全由0或1组成
return(list(data = data, path = path, leaf_avg = leaf_avg))
selected_var <- if (length(IV) > 1) select_var(data, IV, DV) else IV[1]
# 检查子节点数据量，仅在满足最小观测值时递归
left_leaves <- recursive_build(left_data, IV[!IV %in% selected_var], DV, depth - 1, min_obs, new_path_left)
right_leaves <- recursive_build(right_data, IV[!IV %in% selected_var], DV, depth - 1, min_obs, new_path_right)
# 如果任一子节点数据量小于min_obs，返回当前节点作为叶子节点
return(list(data = data, path = path, leaf_avg = leaf_avg))
leaves <- recursive_build(data, IV, DV, depth, min_obs)
